description: The money is to help cover the cost of running the Snaefell Mountain Railway during its 125th year.
title: Snaefell Mountain Railway fans offer to help pay for 125th anniversary service
title_page: Snaefell Mountain Railway fans offer to help pay for 125th anniversary service - BBC News
maintext: The decision not to run mountain trams was taken because there would be "no tourist season" on the island as a result of the border closure, he added.
